dct_title_s: North part of Mason, Vevay Twp
dct_description_sm: Abstract: Cadastral maps of Mason showing property boundaries, building footprints, and names of property owners. Shows former "A Street," "B Street," etc., street naming system.

Notes: Likely detached from: County atlas of Ingham, Michigan / from recent and actual surveys and records under the superintendence of F. W. Beers. New York : F.W. Beers & Co., 1874. Pages 74-75 and 78-79.
